scenes.background: Bob leans in, looking determined. Monica shifts uncomfortably.
scenes.description: 'Bob, maybe you're being too cautious. We can't progress if we're always doubting.'

options.text: Bob, Monica has a point. Maybe a bit of risk could benefit us this time.
options.analysis: You recognize both perspectives, showing balanced social skills and motivation to find a middle ground.

options.text: Monica, Bob is just trying to avoid potential pitfalls. We should at least consider his concerns.
options.analysis: You empathize with Bob's cautious approach, showing understanding and a balanced view of the situation.

options.text: Let's not rush into decisions. Taking a bit more time could save us from bigger issues.
options.analysis: You emphasize the importance of caution, showing good self-regulation and perception of potential risks.
